item.description:
Hi All:

I'm suggesting we pull in the "first Thursday of the month" idea to take advantage of the Extreme 40's arrival in Boston at Fan Pier. Here is their schedule on the 30th:

18:30 -19:00 - Red Bull Air Force skydivers in Race Village

19:00 - Opening Ceremony

21:15 - Fireworks at Boston Harbor at Fan Pier

This way we can get together AND be there for the ceremonies and end with fireworks. The cats race every day at 2:00PM by the way, starting that day, with the race area just off of the ICA.

We'll meet on the deck at Sam's (above Louis), which is right on Fan Pier amidst the VIP area, where we should be able to see all of the festivities.

Cheers, Bob

For more info on the series: http://www.extremesailingseries.com/venues/view/boston-usa

 

And for your Oracle "fans" out there....  Head up, head up, head up, owwwwwwww.....

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HjwY6O2zE0E
item.name: July "Monthly" Meetup during Extreme 40's Opening Day (Nite)
